name: SlimeSlayerDemo
description:
🟢 Slime Slayer Demo 🟢 is a small project from a master's degree class. It is a game that tells the story of a modern world with very advanced technology. Players will take on the role of The adventurer got lost in  the broken basement lab and he comes across a dangerous experimental slime. So he try to fight it to prevent it from escaping into the outside world.

🎮 Controller 🎮

A , D  :  Move character left and right

Z :  Attack    

Z + Z : Attack Combo

X :   Jump

A,D + C : Dash

X + A, D + C :  Jump and Dash
